a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Death rate from pneumonia, by age, World
The annual number of deaths from pneumonia per 100,000 people in each age group.
Note: Deaths from 'clinical pneumonia', which refers to a diagnosis based on disease symptoms such as
coughing and difficulty breathing and may include other lower respiratory diseases.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
